project_name.justification: The article is titled 'P2 Gold Makes Final Payment for Acquisition of Gold-Copper Gabbs Project' and refers to the project throughout the text.

company_name.justification: The buying company is identified in the first sentence: 'VANCOUVER, BC, Feb. 11, 2025 /CNW/ - P2 Gold Inc. ("P2" or the "Company") (TSXV: PGLD) (OTCQB: PGLDF) reports that it has paid US$100,000...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The text states: '...commented Joe Ovsenek, President and CEO of P2.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article mentions the 'acquisition of the gold-copper Gabbs Project' but does not state the specific percentage of interest acquired.

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative metadata specifies the primary commodity as 'Au'. The text supports this by referring to the 'gold-copper Gabbs Project'.

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the source documents.

currency.justification: The text specifies the payment currency: '...reports that it has paid US$100,000 to Waterton Nevada Splitter, LLC...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The text states: 'P2 Gold Inc. ... reports that it has paid US$100,000 to Waterton Nevada Splitter, LLC ("Splitter"), in respect of the final payment due to Splitter relating to the acquisition of the gold-copper Gabbs Project...'

share_payments_raw.justification: The text only describes a cash payment and does not mention any share payments as part of the transaction.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The text explicitly mentions a cash payment, so this combined field is not applicable according to the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The text does not mention any shares being issued as part of the acquisition payment.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share warrant payments.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any option payments.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issued share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not mention an exploration commitment in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions planned exploration activities but does not specify a monetary value for an exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained as part of the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text does not specify the coverage area of the Gabbs project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text does not specify the coverage area of the Gabbs project.

resource_size.justification: The text describes annual average production figures from a preliminary economic assessment ('104,000 ounces gold and 13,500 tonnes copper over a 14.2-year mine life') but does not provide a quantified mineral resource estimate for the project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text identifies the buyer as 'P2 Gold Inc. ('P2' or the 'Company') (TSXV: PGLD)'.
